globalHeaders.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' data: https:; connect-src 'self' https://api.mozedu.org https://*.mozedu.org; object-src 'none'; base-uri 'self'; frame-ancestors 'none'
